description: This Proposition Request (RFP) is for services of instructional designers skilled in creating training materials in both official languages  and in course creation as well as the  collaborators able to develop  course backup materials .
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Shared Services Canada**

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**

**Date Published:** May 26, 2023

**Solicitation Number:** R97344
**Closing Date and Time:** June 12, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EST)
**Location:** National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Ontario

**Contracting Authority:**
Anne-Marie Ouellette
anne-marie.ouellette@ssc-spc.gc.ca
(613) 286-0218

**Scope of Services:**

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of Learning Services, specifically:

* Strategic Leaning Advisory Services (Senior-Learning Advisor)
* Instructional Design & Development Services (Senior-Learning Designer)

This requirement is open only to Learning Services Supply Agreement (LSA) holders. The contract will be awarded to one (1) supplier for a term of up to 24 months, with two (2) option periods of six (6) months each. The services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR) and require a security level of comparability.

**Key Requirements:**

* Bilingual resources (English/French) with fluency in both languages
* Two (2) resources with expertise in learning services
* Ability to communicate orally and in writing without assistance and with minimal errors

**Selection Criteria:**

* Combined rating of technical merit and price

**Evaluation Method:**

* Response to RFP will be evaluated based on the supplier's ability to meet the requirements, technical capabilities, and price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Compliant with World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Attention Suppliers:**

* A Joint Venture between Adirondack Information Management Inc. and Redwood e-learning Systems has been invited to submit a proposal.
* Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Suppliers interested in becoming LSA holders may contact RCNMDAI.-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca

**Procurement Documents:**

* RFP documentation will be sent directly to invited LSA holders.

**Inquiries:**

* Address all inquiries to Anne-Marie Ouellette, Contracting Authority, at anne-marie.ouellette@ssc-spc.gc.ca.

**Note:**

* Only qualified LSA holders will be invited to submit proposals for this requirement.
